hero.description: LinguaMaster transforms YouTube into your personal AI language studio. Interactive subtitles, context-aware AI, and a smart notebook—all in a native desktop app.
hero.grammarText: "Demande" is the 3rd person singular of "demander" (to ask/require).

feature1.headline: Engineered for Flow State
feature1.text: Experience the immersive split-screen Studio Layout. Video on the left, interactive learning on the right. No distractions.

feature2.headline: Context-Aware AI Tutor
feature2.text: Don't just translate. Understand. Our AI analyzes specific sentences within the video context for grammar, summary, and cultural nuance.

feature3.headline: Your Second Brain for Vocabulary
feature3.text: Save words with their original video timestamp and context. Review them in a beautiful masonry grid.
